message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 15-6-1, translated into en
data:
The sub-indicator data may be validated independently by consulting the following websites:

  • ER_CBD_PTYPGRFA: Website of the International Treaty on PGRFA (http://www.fao.org/plant-treaty/countries/membership/en/)
  • ER_CBD_NAGOYA: United Nations Treaty Collection (https://treaties.un.org/Pages/ViewDetails.aspx?src=TREATY&mtdsg_no=XXVII-8-b&chapter=27)
  • CBD ABSCLRHS: Access and Benefit-Sharing Clearing-House Country Profiles (https://absch.cbd.int/countries)
  • ER_CBD_ORSPGRFA: National Reports of the International Treaty (http://www.fao.org/plant-treaty/areas-of-work/compliance/compliance-reports/en/)
  • ER_CBD_SMTA: Easy-SMTA (https://mls.planttreaty.org)

As these sub-indicators are based on nationally reported information, there is no additional consultation or validation process in place with national focal points or authorities.
